docs.lead_paragraph: SEXUAL ECOLOGY Aids and the Destiny of Gay Men. By Gabriel Rotello. 320 pp. New York: Dutton. $24.95. LIFE OUTSIDE The Signorile Report on Gay Men: Sex, Drugs, Muscles, and the Passages of Life. By Michelangelo Signorile. 315 pp. New York: HarperCollins Publishers. $25.
docs.abstract: Daniel J Kevles reviews books Sexual Ecology: AIDS and the Destiny of Gay Men, by Gabriel Rotello, and Life Outside: The Signorile Report on Gay Men, by Michelangelo Signorile (M)
